titleStmt.title: A plaine exposition vpon the whole 8. 9. 10. 11. chapters of the Epistle of Saint Paul to the Romans Wherein the text is diligently and methodically resolued, the sence giuen: and many doctrines thence gathered, are by liuely vses applyed, for the benefit of Gods children performed with much variety, and conuenient breuitie: being the substance of neere foure yeeres weekedayes sermons.: By Elnathan Parr, Bachelor in Diuinity, and preacher of Gods Word.
titleStmt.author: Parr, Elnathan, d. 1622.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Purslowe for Samuel Man, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Swanne,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An exposition vpon the Epistle to the Romanes.
Chap. XI. begins new pagination on a1r.
Reproduction of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Swanne
